Our Headquarters in Bamako

Since 2019, GKS Logistics has been operating from Bamako, Mali. Our headquarters is the heart of our West African operations, offering a comprehensive range of logistics services to meet the needs of our local and international clients.

Why Mali?

Mali is our home and the foundation of our operations. With a strategic location in West Africa, we serve the entire region from our Bamako headquarters, providing comprehensive logistics solutions adapted to the African market.
